entry.title: Payment Protocol Proposal: Invoices/Payments/Receipts
entry.summary: The context mentions a proposal to keep the signature field required. The proposed solution is to use a digital signature over a protocol buffer serialized variation of the SignedPaymentRequest message. In this solution, the signature is a zero-byte array and fields are serialized in numerical order. It is noted that all current protocol buffer implementations serialize fields in numerical order. The public key in pki_data will be used in this solution.
